summary: Mine over 220 new gemstones, 12 new ores, 16 new alloys!! Create over 230 customized weapons or make 9 gem armor sets. Make 14 different gem dining sets! Collect gem coins to exchange for gem keys that unlock around 500 gem chests all over skyrim. Go to a Gemstore to trade, exchange gem coins for keys to unlock a Gem Home. AND MUCH MORE
descriptionHtml:
Just released V2.0 for skyrim remastered
you can mine 150 different gemstones and find them as loot as well as the gem coins
im going to make another one with 250 - 350 gemstones. ill do the whole 500 when
i have some weapons and armors made at the very least, this way, if yur someone who doesnt like
so many gemstones, well now you have a bit of a choice.


to the remastered version for Skyrim Special Edition:

http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/3393/?

















FUTURE OBJECTIVES:
- REVIEW EVERY GEMSTONE'S VALUE, SIZE, APPEARANCE, AND FIX FLOATING ISSUE THROUGH THE MESH OF THE STONES
- ENLARGE GEM BOXES AND REDESIGN GOLDEN CHESTS TO HIGHER RESOLUTION, OR GO WITH LOZ OOT BOSS KEY CHESTS
- I MAY TRY WORKING WITH CROSSBOWS AS FUTURE GEMSTONE WEAPONS
- I WANT TO TRY AND MAKE MINING TOOLS!!
   - FOR SEDIMENTARY ROCKS, YOU WILL REQUIRE A CHISEL
   - FOR METAMORPHIC, MINING PICKS
   - FOR IGNEOUS, MINING HAMMERS
      - AND MAYBE SIFTERS FOR ALLUVIAL DEPOSITS, AND MAYBE EVEN DIAMOND TEIR TOOLS THAT INCREASE CHANCES OF RARER STONES
- GEM HOME - TRY AND CREATE A BUILD UP SCRIPT OF THE HOME, LITERALLY FROM MINING OUT ORE TO PLACING
             THE GRANITE/MARBLE ETC. MIGHT NOT BE AS PROFEESIONAL AS OTHER BUILD UP HOMES, BUT ILL TAKE A CRACK AT IT
  - HOME WILL BE SIMILAR TO GEM HOME FROM V3.5 EXCEPT FOR...
     - 3 FLOORS - BASEMENT - IGNEOUS ROCKS AS FLOORS, WALLS AND CEILING - 1ST FLOOR - METAMORPHIC - 2ND FLOOR - SEDIMENTARY
  - HOME'S LOCATION WILL LIKELY BE ON THE CLIFFS NEAR IVARSTEAD.
  - TRY AND MAKE A GEM GALLERY WHERE ANY GEMSTONE IS PLACEABLE
  - THERE WILL NOT BE A GEMSHOP, BUT THE VENDING MACHINE WILL BE USED, AND I THINK ILL PLACE IT IN AN OPEN LOBBY OF
     THE HOME THAT WILL BE ACCESSIBLE WITHOUT A KEY, HOWEVER KEYS WILL STILL BE REQUIRED TO GET FULL ACCESS OF THE ROOMS
     IN THE HOME, HOWEVER, INSTEAD OF LOOKING FOR GEM COINS TO UNLOCK KEYS, YOU NEED BUILDING MATERIALS.
        - INSIDE THE HOME, AGAIN, WILL BE SIMILAR, SAME STYLE ROOMS, BUT WITH DIFFERNT STYLE FLOORS, WALLS, AND CEILINGS
          ALL I KNOW IS THAT I AM KEEPING THE GRANITE FLOOR FOR THE BASEMENT, I MAY USE MARBLE FOR THE 1ST FLOOR CEILING, NOT SURE YET
 - SMITHING ROOM!!!!! WILL BE VERY DIFFERENT
      - THERE WILL BE A FORGE THAT WILL BE SPECIFICALLY USED FOR GEMSTONE WEAPONS AND ARMOR ONLY!! AND THIS WILL BE THE
         ONLY PLACE IN THE GAME TO MAKE ANYTHING OF 'GEMSTONE COLLECTOR' ORIGIN
      - SUPER ALLOY REACTOR - WILL BE USED TO MAKE ANY GEMSTONE COLLECTOR ALLOY, PLUS VANILLA METALS AS WELL.
      - DIAMOND WHEEL - AGAIN ONLY USEFUL FOR GEMSTONE WEAPONS TO BE TEMPERED
      - GRANITE TABLE - TO TEMPER ONLY GEMSTONE ARMORS, AND TO CRUSH GEODES (WHICH WILL ACT AS A MYSTERY GIFT WHEN FOUND MINING)
      - PEARLESCENT WHEEL - SIMILAR TO THE DIAMOND WHEEL, BUT INSTEAD OF INCREASING DAMAGE TO A WEAPON, IT CAN ENHANCE A
                                     WEAPONS LOOKS WITH A PEARLESCENCE COATING, FROM GATHERING PEARLS FROM CLAMS AND CRUSHING THEM
                                                (WILL ONLY WORK ON CERTAIN GEMSTONE WEAPONS)
 - LABORATORY
      - SUBTERRANEAN AQUIFER - NEED GLASS BOTTLES TO RECIEVE WATER, WHICH ADD HEALTH AND STAMINA, PURIFIED WATER IS 3X RECOVERY
      - ELECTROLYSIS APPARATUS - INSTRUMENT USED FOR SEPERATING ELEMENTS APART FOR ELEMENT EXTRACTION
      - ATMOSPHERIC DISTILLER - USED FOR XTRACTING NOBEL GASES - REQUIRE PYREX GLASS BOTTLES
      - CHEMICAL STABILIZER - USED FOR COMBINING ELEMENTS, MIXING CHEMICALS, CREATING ACIDS, PURIFYING WATER, ETC.
      - ALCHEMIC PURIFIER - THIS WILL BREAKDOWN GEMSTONES INTO ELEMENTS - ALSO MAY BE USED TO MELT ANYTHING ELSE DOWN IN THE GAME
        (OR DWARVEN STOVE)               FOR SCRAP, EX. YOU HAVE A BUNCH OF IRON DAGGERS OR SWORDS, USE THIS AND YOU WILL RECIEVE IRON BACK
                                                                            (THIS ASPECT WILL HAVE ALOT OF USE EARLY ON IN THE GAME)
MAKING A 'CREATE YOUR OWN WEAPON' PORTION IN THIS MOD.
IT WILL BE DIVIDED INTO 3 PARTS, HANDLE, BLADE AND GEMSTONE
 - HANDLE MATERIALS - GOLD, SILVER, PLATINUM, ONYX, ROSE GOLD, ELECTRUM
 - BLADE MATERIALS - BRONZE, STAINLESS STEEL, INCONEL, TITANIUM, MP35N, METEORITE
 - GEMSTONES - AMETHYST, GARNET, EMERALD, SAPPHIRE, RUBY, DIAMOND
                      - POSSIBLY ALSO, IF TIME PERMITS, IMPERIAL JADEITE, OPAL, ALEXANDRITE, CITRINE
ALL THE POSSIBLE WEAPON VARIATIONS WILL BE SET TO HIDDEN, YOU WILL HAVE TO BE HOLDING
A COMBINATION OF ANY OF THESE THREE PARTS IN ORDER TO SEE YOUR CHOICES, OR MAKE ALL THE
PARTS AND SPEND AN HOUR GOING THROUGH EVERY OPTION, I BELIEVE THERE WILL BE BETWEEN
216-360 DIFFERENT VARIENTS

         PYREX BOTTLES WITH SAME EXACT NAME BUT WITH DIFFERENT PRODUCTS
         AND PROBABILITIES!!! THIS IDEA WILL BE APPLIED ON ALL

April 2013

I've been waiting for a gemstone mod to find as loot and sell them, its been a year and a half and only jewelry has been made, so i said screw it and and learned a little modding and made the gemstones i wanted. I am an actual collector of rare and obscure gemstones, and I went through the trouble of making this mod to make my game more detailed and fun! My original desire was to edit the colors on the sapphire and ruby, etc. but i was having too many technical issues to do so, so i explored alternative solutions.

When i finished the gemstones, it felt incomplete, the gemstones themselves were only loot and were basically useless, so i made a weapon out of each gemstone plus several armor sets. There are also a dozen or so weapons that require multiple gemstones to create, which will incline you to collect them.

here are the gemstones in the game, along with the required lvl to mine them (the rarer they are, the less probability of finding them). this list also includes the value of the gemstone, required perk needed to smith into the designed weapon or armor, and the specific weapon or armor that the gemstone can be forged into. You need to have certain smithing perks as listed to smith the weapons you want.

I also made a home with a giant safe to put all the gemstones in for the purpose of this mod:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32671

This mod (V3.5) includes:

223 Gemstones
9 Armor Sets
239 Weapons
26 Extra Armor Pieces
72 Accessories
197 Bonus Items
